alert.note: Alert for Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:19PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Teller and western El Paso Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 119 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Westcreek, or 30 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodland Park and Divide. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft
